docs.title: Xtyle | CSS
docs.text:
Welcome to Xtyle-CSS a tool design to be a colorless and without components framework.

Main purpose is to complement Xtyle. But you can use this as a standalone tool.

docs.title: No Install
docs.text:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/xtyle-css@latest" />

Tools

d | m | p | t | b | s | o | e | l | row | col | g

docs.title: Utils
docs.text: Key Description d Display m Margin (Spacing) p Padding (Spacing) t Text b Borders s Shadows o Overflow e Extras l Layout row Row (Rows & Columns) col Column (Rows & Columns) g Gap (Rows & Columns)

docs.title: Inspired by
docs.text:
Normalize.css

This project now also includes the [**`normalize.css`**](https://necolas.github.io/normalize.css/)

A couple of projects including bootstrap have inspired me to make my own set of tools built with consonantly seen ideas. If you are looking for a production ready, i will recommend using on of these tools or another tool.

  • Material Design Lite
  • Vuetify
  • Chota
  • Tachyons

docs.title: Util | Borders
docs.text: Follow this schema b{type}-{value}.

docs.title: Borders (Options)
docs.text:
Key Description bw Border-Width ~ Options: (0 to 5) bs Border-Style ~ Options: (dotted - dashed - solid) br Border-Radius ~ Options: (0 to 4) and (100p - pill - b - t - r - l) bd Border-Display ~ Options: (a - b - t - r - l) or (n - nb - nt - nr - nl)

Tip

You will notice the "**`b`, `t`, `r`, `l`**" a lot and sometimes the "**`n`**"

- <code class="big">B</code> stands for **Bottom**
- <code class="big">T</code> stands for **Top**
- <code class="big">R</code> stands for **Right**
- <code class="big">L</code> stands for **Left**

and . . .

- <code class="big">N</code> stands for **Negative** aka: the opposite. In this case **`display : none`** borders.
- <code class="big">A</code> stands for **All** In this case **`display : all`** borders.

docs.title: Variables | root
docs.text:
:root {
  /* Sizes */
  --app-header: 50px;
  --app-footer: 50px;
  --app-left: 185px;
  --app-right: 185px;

  /* Sizes - Mini */
  --app-left-mini: 60px;
  --app-right-mini: 60px;

  /* Z-Index */
  --app-header-layer: 2;
  --app-footer-layer: 2;
  --app-left-layer: 1;
  --app-right-layer: 1;
}

docs.title: Util | Text
docs.text:
Follow this schema t{type}-{value}.

Key Description ts Text-Size ~ Options: (1 to 6) td Text-Decoration ~ Options: (i - b - u - s ) tt Text-Transform ~ Options: (t - u - l - c ) ta Text-Align ~ Options: (c - r - l ) tf Text-Font

Text Fonts

sans-serif | serif | code | courier | helvetica | avenir | athelas | georgia | times | bodoni | calisto | garamond | baskerville

docs.title: Text Transform
docs.text:
• t meaning Title (capitalize)
  • u meaning Upper (uppercase)
  • l meaning Lower (lowercase)
  • c meaning Cut (ellipsis)

docs.title: Text Decoration
docs.text:
• i meaning Italic (italic)
  • b meaning Bold (bold)
  • u meaning Underline (underline)
  • s meaning Strike (line-through)

docs.title: Text Align
docs.text:
• c meaning Center (center)
  • l meaning Left (left)
  • r meaning Right (right)
